text: Neil David Van Sickle (July 8, 1915 â€“ September 29, 2019) was an American Air Force major general. He was the deputy inspector general at Headquarters, United States Air Force, Washington, D.C. Van Sickle was born in Minot, North Dakota on July 8, 1915. On January 15, 1965, he assumed command of the U.S. Air Force Recruiting Service, with headquarters at Randolph Air Force Base. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1915 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American centenarians Category:American generals Category:American military personnel of World War II Category:People from Minot, North Dakota Category:Military people from North Dakota
title: Neil D. Van Sickle
